keyMoments.title: Puzzle Awakens from Fever
keyMoments.description: Puzzle regains consciousness after being treated by Chopper, with his crew hopeful he will lead them back to the New World.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Puzzle, establishing his character and current defeated state.
keyMoments.quote: We aren't going back to the New World. We aren't pirates anymore. Our pride is gone.

keyMoments.title: Declares They Are No Longer Pirates
keyMoments.description: Puzzle devastates his crew by declaring they will not return to the New World and are no longer pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Defines Puzzle's broken spirit and sets up his character arc of redemption.
keyMoments.quote: We aren't going back to the New World. We aren't pirates anymore. Our pride is gone.

relationships.description: Vigaro was Puzzle's first mate and vice-captain who sacrificed himself to save the crew in the New World.

evolutionMoments.description: Vigaro's death in the New World is revealed through flashback, showing his sacrifice to save Puzzle and the crew.

relationships.description: Jiro is a young member of Puzzle's crew who deeply admires and believes in his captain.

evolutionMoments.description: Jiro cares for the unconscious Puzzle and is devastated when Puzzle declares they are no longer pirates.

reveals.information: Led his crew into the New World where they were defeated and his first mate Vigaro was killed
Has lost his will to be a pirate due to guilt over Vigaro's death
Has a phoenix-shaped birthmark on his forehead (hidden under bandages in this episode)

keyMoments.title: Vigaro's Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: Vigaro sacrifices himself to disable the enemy ship's rudder, allowing Puzzle and the Phoenix Pirates to escape from their attackers in the New World.
keyMoments.significance: His death is the traumatic event that breaks Puzzle's spirit and leads to the Phoenix Pirates giving up their dreams.
keyMoments.quote: I trust you completely, Captain. I'll make sure you escape safely!

statusHistory.causeOfDeath: Killed while sacrificing himself to save his crew from attackers in the New World

relationships.description: Vigaro was Puzzle's loyal first mate who trusted him completely and gave his life to ensure Puzzle's escape.

evolutionMoments.description: Vigaro dies protecting Puzzle and the crew, demonstrating his absolute loyalty to his captain.

reveals.information: Died in the New World sacrificing himself to save the Phoenix Pirates
Completely trusted Puzzle and was willing to sacrifice his life for his captain and crew
Was the first mate and vice-captain of the Phoenix Pirates

keyMoments.title: Jiro Recounts the New World Defeat
keyMoments.description: Jiro tells Puzzle about how Vigaro sacrificed himself during their defeat in the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Jiro's role as a witness to the traumatic events and his loyalty to his captain.

abilities.description: Jiro wields a large chain as his weapon.

relationships.description: Jiro deeply admires Puzzle and believes in him as captain, showing unwavering loyalty.

evolutionMoments.description: Jiro cares for Puzzle during his illness and is devastated by his decision to give up being a pirate.

relationships.description: Jiro works with Chopper to treat Puzzle's injuries.

evolutionMoments.description: Jiro helps Chopper care for the unconscious Puzzle.

reveals.information: Is 11 years old, making him the youngest member of the Phoenix Pirates
Deeply loyal and believes strongly in his captain despite Puzzle's despair

keyMoments.title: Stansen's Decision Validated
keyMoments.description: Puzzle acknowledges that Stansen was right to make the decision to work for the Accino Family while Puzzle was unconscious.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that Stansen made the difficult choice to submit to the Accino Family to protect the crew.

relationships.description: Stansen temporarily led the crew when Puzzle was incapacitated and made the decision to work for the Accino Family.

evolutionMoments.description: Puzzle validates Stansen's decision to submit to the Accino Family as the right choice.

reveals.information: Made the decision to work for the Accino Family while Puzzle was unconscious
Temporarily acted as leader of the Phoenix Pirates when Puzzle was incapacitated
